data.text: Dawuda xa bɛɛti
N xa Alatala tantu n nii birin na,
A tan nan diɲɛma i xa yunubie ma,
a i ratanga faxɛ ma,
A hinnɛma i ra i xa duniɲɛigiri kui,
Alatala ɲɛrɛma tinxinyi kui,
A bara a xa kira masen Annabi Munsa bɛ,
Alatala kinikinima mixie ma, a hinnɛ e ra,
A mu mixie tɔɔrɔma tɛmui birin,
A mu won ɲaxankatama won ma yunubi rabaxi ki ma,
Koore itexi bɔxi xun ma ki naxɛ,
Sogetede makuyaxi sogegorode ra ki naxɛ,
Babae kinikinima e xa die ma ki naxɛ,
barima a a kolon won yailanxi se naxan na,
Adamadie xa simaya maniya sansi ra naxan fugama fiili ma,
kɔnɔ foye na bɔnbɔ a ra, a xarama nɛ, a lɔɛ.
Kɔnɔ Alatala a yaragaaxuie xanuma nɛ abadan,
naxee a xa saatɛ binyama,
Alatala bara a xa kibanyi dɔxɔ koore ma,
Wo tan malekɛe, wo xa Alatala tantu,
Wo tan sɛnbɛma naxee na koore ma,
Wo tan birin naxee daaxi,
